notes.title: Mon Feb 21
notes.text: Today I went outside and walked my dog. He was very well behaved and did not bark at the other dogs.

notes.title: Mood
notes.text: I am so proud of myself for catching up on my schoolwork. I was behind for a little bit, but after buckling down and getting busy things started to get a little bit easier for me.

notes.title: Dinner
notes.text: Tonight I am having chicken and rice for dinner. It's a very simple dish, but it's that I know is going to turn out so good.

notes.title: Relax
notes.text: Today I am going to treat myself to a nice day of relaxation after catching up on my work.
